channel.title: Cunt
channel.description:
woke up this morning to a shattered car window, $400 to fix, insurance excess is $500.
holy fuck i hate people

Tough break.

[quote=“Original Daniel, post:4, topic:324336”]I called around for ages and found a guy who will do it for $240. It’s not a windscreen so I don’t need to be concerned about it leaking ey?

The quote in my sig is from calvin and hobbes.[/quote]
That sounds fun… driving in the ran and getting soaked. l0l

item.title: Cunt
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Original Daniel:

I called around for ages and found a guy who will do it for $240. It’s not a windscreen so I don’t need to be concerned about it leaking ey?

You still have to worry about it leaking when it rains and such. If it is installed correctly it won’t leak though.

item.title: Cunt
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

Reminds me of a story:

I used to work for my neighbor in a supermarket. I was told to go throw away this bag of old onions. The dumpster is located at the back of the shop outside. The car park is behind a wall which is behind the dumpster. I was bored out of my dacks so I decided to have some fun. Rather than simply throwing the bag in the dumpster, I swung it around in circles like a gladiator and threw it from a distance. It flew too high and landed on the other side of the wall. I wasn’t too bothered, it was only a while later that I remembered the car park was behind the dumpster.

As soon as I remembered I rushed to the scene, upon inspecting I found that the bag of onions smashed through a car’s front window. Not any car, it was the car that belonged to the biggest, meanest man I had ever seen in my life. He worked in the same supermarket and had hands the size of my face.

That’s as interesting as it got, my dad ended up saving the day :p.

Read full topic

item.title: Cunt
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Lothy:

On another note, I like your signature.

en.wikipedia.org

Calvin and Hobbes

Calvin and Hobbes is a daily comic strip by American cartoonist Bill Watterson that was syndicated from November 18, 1985 to December 31, 1995. Commonly cited as "the last great newspaper comic", Calvin and Hobbes has enjoyed broad and enduring popularity, influence, and academic interest. Calvin and Hobbes follows the humorous antics of Calvin, a precocious, mischievous, and adventurous six-year-old boy, and Hobbes, his sardonic stuffed tiger. Set in the contemporary suburban United States...

item.title: Cunt
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Get a different place to install your glass for cheaper.

Here, near Dayton, OH, I had to get glass put in a 1990 Chevrolet 454SS (1/2 ton truck) and almost every place I called wanted $350-$400 to do it. Then I called Glass Masters, and they did it for $150. Great job too, I’ve since had them replace a few other windshields and it has been perfect every time.

On the other hand, I had Triumph Auto Glass put a windshield in my 1989 S10 before this, and they replaced it 3 times before I got a hold of the District Manager who drove 3 hours from Louisville Kentucky to replace it a 4th time personally before it didn’t leak, and that only lasted a year before it started leaking again. Bottom line, don’t ever go with Triumph Auto Glass, ever.

Read full topic
